blog.name: dailygir1z
blog.title: Our love is pure. Our love is beautiful.
blog.description:
A trans lesbian headcanon blog formed in the wake of @daily-girlz hacking so that trans women will forever have a place to safely project and headcanon. Currently penned by Mods Miyu, Arashi, Faye, and Tombo.

Links here!

We do not accept submissions for: Happy Sugar Life, Killing Stalking, Citrus, most 'yandere' characters (make a very good case for yourself and we might accept as we look at these from a case-to-case basis, but don't get your hopes up)

tags: don't @ me trying to argue about an opinion
summary: In your opinion——> Eri being the best adopted daughter in the tododeku fan verse
question: In your opinion——> Eri being the best adopted daughter in the tododeku fan verse
answer:
It’s an absolutely adorable concept that I can see a lot of people enjoying but in my opinion, I don’t really see the full function of it other than for their friendship/attachment to each other, which - let’s be honest - can work just fine without adoption.

If I try to put it into the perspective of my Tododeku Adoption AU, a part of why the adoption could potentially work was because Tododeku are older, with the means to be independent and able to take care of themselves, each other and discover there is space to care for someone who needs a lot of attention (Kousetsu). At that point in their life, Eri is also much older, mature and probably (hopefully) is able to think for herself without a strict guardian.

So, while I think it would be super cute if Eri is with them I also don’t think she necessarily has to be adopted by them. This isn’t a family made of blood and it certainly doesn’t have to be a family forged in legal documents either.

I’ll just put it down here though in case, this is in no way saying it shouldn’t be done. If you have a craving for Tododeku adopting Eri, then, by all means, go for it. Make what you enjoy. That’s what I did and that’s what you should do too.
